name: Work In Progress (Gaskellgames)
description:
As part of the Computer Games Design module in my second year of university, we completed 'Game A Week' for 6 weeks. The sixth week's theme was to Gift a Game.

The final week's theme was to Gift a Game to someone else. For my game I decided to create a game that was based around my brother's music. The game was created in the Unity game engine using C# scripts.

Please Note: This is a mechanic showcase and not a full game
